name: frosting-syntax

0.1.0.name: frosting-syntax
0.1.0.description: A light theme inspired by the github syntax theme. Works best with one light ui theme.
0.1.0.author: Akramin Akib (https://akraminakib.github.io)

readme:
# Frosting - Syntax Theme for Atom

## Install This repository is distributed with [apm][apm]. After [installing apm][install-apm], you can install `frosting-syntax` with this command. ``` $ apm install frosting-syntax ``` ## Usage After installation, you can enable this theme in your [Atom theme settings](http://flight-manual.atom.io/using-atom/sections/atom-packages/#_atom_themes). ## Supported languages - CSS / Less / SASS / SCSS - Python - Javascript

metadata.name: frosting-syntax
